title: No dedication (no education)
creator_contributor_role: Ballarat Aboriginal Cooperative Youth Group, creator
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: Johnny Mac, Koorie MC gives the rap on education
description: This film is part documentary and part music video. On Sunday 17th April 2005, Johnny Mac, a Koorie MC from Melbourne, performed at an outdoor concert and BBQ for 40 odd kids and their parents at the Ballarat Aboriginal Cooperative. The theme of the song and the day was education and the kids captured footage of the show and interviewed their parents and Elders about their school days.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006779; First Hand: five films; Active; 2005
